articles.description: The IPO is a mix of a fresh issue of shares worth Rs 1,250 crore and an offer for sale of up to 3.49 crore shares.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: The biggest pharma IPO Gland Pharma attracted just 4 per cent bids on the first day of the bidding process till 5 pm.
The Rs 6,480 crore issue had received bids for 12,69,110 shares so fa… [+1992 chars]

articles.title: Royal Enfield Meteor 350 vs Classic 350: Which motorcycle vibrates more? [Video] - CarToq.com
articles.description: One of the main issues with older Royal Enfields were that they were not refined and used to vibrate a lot. This used to make long distance riding at higher speeds quite tiresome. The new one has improved a lot from older Classic 350 and here we have video th…
articles.content: Royal Enfield recently launched their new motorcycle Meteor 350 in the market. It is an all-new motorcycle that is build from scratch. The Meteor 350 is currently the only motorcycle from Royal Enfie… [+2898 chars]
